The Mary Text-to-Speech Synthesis system, version 3.6.0

Program documentation for the Java code within the Mary TTS system.

Program documentation for the Java code within the Mary TTS system. The system is composed of a main server or "manager" program, a number of modules doing the actual processing, and a client sending input data and receiving processing results.

The main server is located in the de.dfki.lt.mary package. The individual modules can be found in the de.dfki.lt.mary.modules package and subpackages. The client, including a GUI interface, is located in the de.dfki.lt.mary.client package.

For content-oriented documentation of the system and online demos see the Mary Homepage.

See Also:
Mary.main(java.lang.String[])
